Rozas y alumnas heridas en L7: "Hubo una abierta falta de observación, de aplicación del protocolo"
El general director reconoció que "se utilizó la escopeta antidisturbios, aparentemente de forma indebida".
06 Nov 2019 by Yem Manríquez
El general director de Carabineros, Mario Rozas, reconoció que "hubo una abierta falta de observación, de aplicación del protocolo" con estudiantes del Liceo 7 de Santiago, donde menores de edad resultaron heridas por perdigones.
"Dentro de la contingencia, sí hemos cometido muchos errores, porque esto es bastante especial, una cosa muy compleja", aceptó.
"Cada vez que hemos cometido un error y hemos recibido alguna denuncia sobre abusos, sobre excesos, esa denuncia se acoge, se denuncia al Ministerio Público y se inician los sumarios administrativos, tal como ha pasado ahora que en el Liceo 7 de Santiago, me acaban de informar de que hubo una abierta falta de observación, de aplicación del protocolo", explicó el uniformado a la prensa.
Detallando que "hubo una situación con la rectora del establecimiento, llegaron los carabineros y se utilizó la escopeta antidisturbios, aparentemente de forma indebida, y eso se deberá establecer a través del sumario administrativo".

Rozas and students injured in L7: "There was an open lack of observation, of application of the protocol"
The general director acknowledged that "the rifle shotgun was used, apparently improperly."
06 Nov 2019 by Yem Manríquez
The general director of Police, Mario Rozas, acknowledged that "there was an open lack of observation, of application of the protocol" with students of the Liceo 7 of Santiago, where minors were injured by pellets.
"Within the contingency, we have made many mistakes, because this is quite special, a very complex thing," he accepted.
"Every time we have made a mistake and we have received some complaint about abuses, about excesses, that complaint is accepted, the Public Prosecutor is denounced and the administrative summaries are initiated, as it has happened now that at the Liceo 7 of Santiago, I they have just reported that there was an open lack of observation, of application of the protocol, "the uniformed man told the press.
Detailing that "there was a situation with the rector of the establishment, the police arrived and the riot gun was used, apparently unduly, and that should be established through the administrative summary."
